entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 6:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
